newsitem.title: LATVIA: NOON RADIO HEADLINES ON APRIL 1.
newsitem.headline: NOON RADIO HEADLINES ON APRIL 1.

text.p: These were the main headlines on on Latvian state radio on Tuesday at noon. Reuters has not verified these reports and cannot vouch for their accuracy.
- Today is the deadline for civil cervants to submit their income declarations.

- The defence speeches in the trial of alleged mafia leader Ivan Haritonov will be tomorrow. In the year-long proceedings, the prosecutor has demanded a 13-year prison sentence for Haritonov and most of his seven alleged accomplices.
- The radio plays an April Fool's joke, saying the ferry Rusj, plying between Stockholm and Riga, will be renamed "Latvis" and the crew will wear Latvian national dress.
